Posts.EditableText:
Hi I just wondered if there was a problem with this game sone I uploaded it. I tried it recently and have found that all the looked doors that I used to have in the game are now not locked anymore. I think others have found the same problem. Is there a glitch?

CJ
Posts.HTML:
Hi I just wondered if there was a problem with this game sone I uploaded it. I tried it recently and have found that all the looked doors that I used to have in the game are now not locked anymore. I think others have found the same problem. Is there a glitch?

Posts.EditableText: Looks like we're using an out-of-date quest.dat file in Quest 5, which means this problem will affect .CAS files (the "play online" facility uses the Quest 5 "legacy" ASL interpreter). I'll fix this as a priority for the next bug fix release of Quest 5, and update the site. http://quest.codeplex.com/workitem/908
Posts.HTML:
Looks like we're using an out-of-date quest.dat file in Quest 5, which means this problem will affect .CAS files (the "play online" facility uses the Quest 5 "legacy" ASL interpreter).

I'll fix this as a priority for the next bug fix release of Quest 5, and update the site. http://quest.codeplex.com/workitem/908

Posts.EditableText: Good to see you have noticed this problem. I also noticed I could get into rooms I unlocked later and that was quite weird. I have a question also, if you break the aerial on the black box, can you still use it to get to the key in the drain?
